name.ja: ドラゴンメイド・ラティス

text.en:
2 "Dragonmaid" monsters with the same Attribute but different Levels
Must first be Special Summoned (from your Extra Deck) by banishing 1 each of the above cards from your field and GY. You can only use each of the following effects of "Lady's Dragonmaid" once per turn. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower "Dragonmaid" monster from your Deck. During the Standby Phase: You can Fusion Summon 1 Dragon Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck, by shuffling its materials from your field and/or banishment into the Deck.

materials: 2 "Dragonmaid" monsters with the same Attribute but different Levels
